about_the_game:
Spooky Halloween Resurrection

This atmospheric horror game takes you to the heart of Halloween, but in a different way than you expected. A mystical world awaits you, filled with horror and uncertainty, where you will have to fight for your life in a network of other players. Experience a true horror experience that will make you afraid of even your own shadow!

Mesmerizing atmosphere of horror

Halloween Online Horror Night gives you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the creepy atmosphere of the scariest night of the year. Forget about the outside worlds and prepare for the absolute unknown. Every corner of the game world is filled with sinister details that create a unique atmosphere of horror.

Hide from the plague doctor

Halloween brought something much more sinister than just ghosts and witches. You are being pursued by a sinister plague doctor who is ready to use any means to catch you. You must skillfully hide, travel through dark locations and find ways to escape from its terrible traps.

Collaboration and communication

To survive in this nightmare game, cooperation with other players is the key to success. Use voice chat and regular chat to plan your survival. Communication and joint efforts with other players will help you find the necessary items and solve puzzles that block the path to salvation.

Solve puzzles and fight for your life

Halloween Online Horror Night offers a variety of intriguing puzzles and challenges that you will have to solve in order to progress and find your way to safety. Use leverage, explore mysterious places and fight for your life in this horror game full of unexpected twists and turns.

Prepare for real horror

Halloween Online Horror Night is not just a game, it is a real horror experience that will make you afraid and experience real moments of fear. Feel free to venture into this nightmare world and try to escape together with other players. Will you survive this terrible night?

name: Halloween Online Horror Night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Escape this hellish show with other players in Halloween Online Horror Night!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
